thread.section_title: Hotel Original Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Don't go anywhere else
thread.title_full: Don't go anywhere else - Review of Hotel Original Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MichaelNag
title: Don't go anywhere else
text:
If you are planning on having a break in the Bastille area don't look further, the staff is wonderful and helpfull, the rooms are to a high standard and the decoration throughout is really something else!
A little Gem not to be missed!
Room Tip: Second floor for the balcony or top floor for the view! See more room tips
